roleset.name: abnormally narrow, abnormal narrowing of a canal or duct in the body
roleset.note: STRICTURE-V NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to strictureing.01 and constrict.01. Constrict.01 is a member of VN class other_cos-45.4. No FN class. Framed by Katie. (from stricture.01-v)

example.name: Arg 2 rather than arg 4 because this tells the reach (ext) of the stricture but not where it releases its grip
example.text: [She-1] likely is strictured [*-1]for quite a ways beyond just the transverse colon.
example.arg: for quite a ways beyond just the transverse colon.
